fields.summary: iOS: App crashes with: "A view can only be associated with at most one view controller at a time"

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.summary: iOS: App crashes with: "A view can only be associated with at most one view controller at a time"

comments.body:
Hi,

We have not heard back from you since you posted the issue. Not sure if this is still throwing error in your app with the latest TiSDK. If so, please send us a test case so that we can take next necessary step to fix. If we don't hear back, we will assume the issue is no longer valid and close it. 

Thanks,
